p: Mosquito-borne diseases such as dengue fever, yellow fever, malaria, filariasis, viral encephalitis affects large human population. Their bite causes serious allergy, local skin reaction, and systemic reaction. Extract of H. suaveolens shows larvicidal activity against yellow fever mosquito Aedes aegypti (L), Aedes albopictus larvae. Larvicidal activity of this plant is due to compounds like alpha-pinene, beta-pinene, sabinene, terpinolene, beta-caryophyllene, and 4-terpineol [ 84].
